long_description: Self-purging pump features improved threads for added durability, is easy to adjust and won't leak when you remove it from the stove after cooking. Improves performance of the MSR Dragonfly stove. Equipped with additional valve that provides secondary fuel shut-off protection to prevent accidents. Glass-reinforced polymer material is lightweight and durable. Great to have on hand as a spare for those just-in-case situations in the backcountry. For use with MSR Dragonfly stove only.
short_description: Self-purging pump features improved threads for added durability, is easy to adjust and won't leak when you remove it from the stove after cooking.
